shortDescription: Integrate secure, customizable, user-friendly identity management for customers with Microsoft Entra External ID.
title: Microsoft Entra External ID
description:
We're thrilled to announce the general availability (GA) of Microsoft Entra External ID , our next-generation, developer-friendly customer identity access management (CIAM) solution. Whether you're building applications for partners, business customers or consumers, External ID makes secure and customizable CIAM simple. 
 
 Microsoft Entra External ID enables you to: 
 1. Secure all identities with a single solution. 
 2. Streamline secure collaboration. 
 3. Create frictionless end user experiences. 
 4. Accelerate the development of secure applications.
